# Minard meat map
## Point Microcharts

```{r, out.width="60%", fig.align="center", fig.cap="Chart by Charles Joseph Minard"}

masthead <- "assets/minard-meat-map_original.png"
knitr::include_graphics(masthead, dpi=72)

```


***

### Ingest
#### Production

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

df <- read.csv("archetypes/minard-meat-map/dpt_production.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
head(df, n = 10)

```


### Ingest
#### Departments


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

dep_colormap <- read.csv("archetypes/minard-meat-map/departments-colormap.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
head(dep_colormap, n = 10)

```


### Base map
#### France


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-show'}

fr_map <- st_read("archetypes/minard-meat-map/shp/departements-20140306-100m.shp")
# glimpse(fr_map)

```


### Wrangle
#### Rescale and merge


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-show'}

# rescale / normalize value to size pies
df$r <- rescale(df$prod_tot, to=c(0.1,0.25))

# merge colormap to map data
fr_df <- merge(fr_map, dep_colormap, by.x = "code_insee", by.y = "code_insee_c", all = TRUE)
# fr_df

```


### Plot
#### symbol / chart map


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source='fold-hide', fig.align='center', out.width="100%"}

theme_opts <- theme(
  text = element_text(family = "inconsolata"), 
  plot.title = element_text(color = "black", size = 14, face = "bold", family = "inconsolata"),
  plot.subtitle = element_text(color = "black", size = 12, family = "inconsolata"),
  plot.caption = element_text(color = "#555555", size = 8, family = "inconsolata"),
  plot.background = element_blank(),
  panel.grid = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
  panel.background=element_rect(fill="white", colour="white"),
  panel.border = element_blank(),
  axis.text = element_blank(),
  axis.line = element_blank(),
  axis.ticks = element_blank(),
  axis.title = element_blank(),
  legend.position = "none",
  legend.title = element_blank(),
)

pie_pal <- c("noir" = "#1e1e1b",
         "rouge" = "#d4315f",
         "vert" = "#49916e")

v1 = ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = fr_df, fill = fr_df$color, color = "#1e1e1b", size = 0.25 ) +
  # geom_text(data = df, aes(X, Y, label = code_insee), color = "#1e1e1b", size = 2) +
  geom_scatterpie(data = df, 
                    aes(X, Y, r = r, group=code_insee),
                    cols = c("noir", "rouge", "vert"), 
                    #color=NA,
                    alpha = 0.8) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = pie_pal) +
  coord_sf(xlim = c(-7, 10),  ylim = c(41, 51)) +
  labs(title = "CARTE FIGURATIVE et approximative des quantitiés de\nViandes de Boucherie envoyées sur pied par les Départments et\nconsommées a Paris.",
         subtitle = "Dresée par Mr. MINARD, Inspecteur Général des Ponts et Chaussées en retraite.",
         caption = "figures approximated from original",
         fill = NULL) +
  theme_opts

girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 16, height_svg = 14.5,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0)))

```
